name: AVRoutePickerView.ButtonState
desc: Constant values describing the available button states.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: The normal, or default, button state.

items.name: case normalHighlighted
items.desc: The highlighted button state when a mouse-down event occurs inside the button.

items.name: case active
items.desc: The button state when AirPlay is active.

items.name: case activeHighlighted
items.desc: The highlighted button state when AirPlay is active.
